divs: Sighting DetailsMy father in law took photos of the sunrise in the Margate area in Kwa Zulu Natal in South Africa. A few months later he showed me his vacation photos, as he like to take photos of mother nature. i picked up this triangular shaped object in the clouds. i do not know what it is, but sure as hell it isn't a plane.
